abstract: Amazon is now in the data business, offering researchers and business access to huge volumes of information, including census data and the human genome.
snippet: Amazon is now in the data business, offering researchers and business access to huge volumes of information, including census data and the human genome.
lead_paragraph: Forget books, MP3 players or vacuums. Amazon.com wants to offer you a copy of the human genome this holiday season.

headline.main: Amazon Starts Renting Out the Human Genome
